reviewText:
This, like David and lisa is not U.S.A. formatted, but my friend lives in city that has
facilities for re-formatting.  Hope that didn't cost her a lot -- it was a gift!
The production was weak and had poor substance, my favorite actors could have used better. A 10 dollar movie at best

Though not really what I would call a musical, there is a lot of very good music here.  Made in Germany with ENGLISH and GERMAN dialogue. Takes place in decadent Germany just before the rise of Hitler.  David Bowie, Kim Novak, Marlene Dietrich, and Synde Rome all give sterling performances. I think it was Dietrich`s final film. Too bad it isn`t available in the U.S.
